quote: The greatest of empires, is the empire over one's self.
author: Publilius Syrus
h:
“The greatest of empires, is the empire over one's self.” —
Publilius Syrus

quote: Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.
author: Aristotle
h:
“Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.” —
Aristotle

quote: If what you're doing is not your passion, you have nothing to lose.
author: Celestine Chua
h:
“If what you're doing is not your passion, you have nothing to lose.” —
Celestine Chua

quote: The temptation to give up is strongest just before victory.
author: Zen Proverb
h:
“The temptation to give up is strongest just before victory.” —
Zen Proverb

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead
h:
“Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else. ” —
Margaret Mead

quote: I never dwell on what happened. You can't change it. Move forward.
author: Joan Rivers
h:
“I never dwell on what happened. You can't change it. Move forward.” —
Joan Rivers

quote: A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.
author: Chinese Proverb
h:
“A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.” —
Chinese Proverb

quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.
author: Gilbert Chesterton
h:
“Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

quote: A hut full of laughter is richer than a palace full of sadness.
author: Zen Proverb
h:
“A hut full of laughter is richer than a palace full of sadness.” —
Zen Proverb

quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.

h:
“At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.” —
Steve Maraboli

quote: The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
author: Dan Millman
h:
“The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.” —
Dan Millman

quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King
h:
“Get busy living, or get busy dying.” —
Stephen King

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle
h:
“Happiness depends upon ourselves.” —
Aristotle

quote: Embody what you teach, and teach only what you have embodied.
author: Dan Millman
h:
“Embody what you teach, and teach only what you have embodied.” —
Dan Millman

quote: When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to lose.
author: Bob Dylan
h:
“When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to lose.” —
Bob Dylan

quote: Be where your enemy is not.
author: Sun Tzu
h:
“Be where your enemy is not.” —
Sun Tzu

quote: If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
author: John Carmack
h:
“If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.” —
John Carmack

quote: An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises.

h:
“An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises.” —
Mae West

quote: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.

h:
“Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more. ” —
Nikola Tesla

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

h:
“When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it. ” —
Henry Ford

quote: Decide whether or not the goal is worth the risks involved. If it is, stop worrying.

h:
“Decide whether or not the goal is worth the risks involved. If it is, stop worrying.” —
Amelia Earhart

quote: The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.

h:
“The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.” —
Walt Disney

quote: A needle is not sharp at both ends.
author: Chinese Proverb
h:
“A needle is not sharp at both ends. ” —
Chinese Proverb

quote: If you can see it in your mind, you can hold it in your mind.
author: Steve Harvey
h:
“If you can see it in your mind, you can hold it in your mind.” —
Steve Harvey

quote: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness. Listen to it carefully.
author: Richard Bach
h:
“Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness. Listen to it carefully.” —
Richard Bach

quote: Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself.
author: Oprah Winfrey
h:
“Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself.” —
Oprah Winfrey

quote: We ordinary people must forge our own beauty.

h:
“We ordinary people must forge our own beauty.” —
Kenji Miyazawa

quote: Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
author: Lolly Daskal
h:
“Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.” —
Lolly Daskal

quote: It is important to fight and fight again, and keep fighting, for only then can evil be kept at bay though never quite eradicated.
author: Albus Dumbledore
h:
“It is important to fight and fight again, and keep fighting, for only then can evil be kept at bay though never quite eradicated.” —
Albus Dumbledore

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.

h:
“Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Those who attain the middle Dominate the whole.
author: Ming-Dao Deng
h:
“Those who attain the middle Dominate the whole.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela
h:
“It always seems impossible until it's done.” —
Nelson Mandela

quote: Unless a man is master of his soul, all other kinds of mastery amount to little.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
h:
“Unless a man is master of his soul, all other kinds of mastery amount to little.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.

h:
“The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.” —
Jim Rohn

quote: Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.
author: Kamal Ravikant
h:
“Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.” —
Kamal Ravikant

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
author: Steve Jobs
h:
“Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.” —
Steve Jobs

quote: It is only depth of character that determines the profundity with which we face life.

h:
“It is only depth of character that determines the profundity with which we face life.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

quote: It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.
author: Alan Watts
h:
“It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.” —
Alan Watts

quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.

h:
“Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.” —
Ayn Rand

quote: Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.
author: Ayn Rand
h:
“Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.” —
Ayn Rand

quote: An inventor is a man who asks Why? of the universe and lets nothing stand between the answer and his mind.
author: Ayn Rand
h:
“An inventor is a man who asks Why? of the universe and lets nothing stand between the answer and his mind.” —
Ayn Rand

quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul. Wisdom is better than silver and gold.
author: Bob Marley
h:
“Don't gain the world and lose your soul. Wisdom is better than silver and gold.” —
Bob Marley

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw
h:
“Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.” —
George Bernard Shaw

quote: Nothing makes a man broad-minded like adversity.
author: Will Rogers
h:
“Nothing makes a man broad-minded like adversity.” —
Will Rogers

quote: Just try to be the best you can be; never cease trying to be the best you can be. That's in your power.
author: John Wooden
h:
“Just try to be the best you can be; never cease trying to be the best you can be. That's in your power.” —
John Wooden

quote: The past has no power over the present moment.

h:
“The past has no power over the present moment. ” —
Eckhart Tolle

quote: Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
author: William James
h:
“Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.” —
William James

quote: We must not sit down and wait for miracles. Up and be going!
author: John Eliot
h:
“We must not sit down and wait for miracles. Up and be going!” —
John Eliot

quote: Just throw away all thoughts of imaginary things, and stand firm in that which you are.
author: Kabir
h:
“Just throw away all thoughts of imaginary things, and stand firm in that which you are.” —
Kabir

quote: Fools talk, cowards are silent, wise men listen.

h:
“Fools talk, cowards are silent, wise men listen.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: Walk slowly but never walk backward.
author: Unknown
h:
“Walk slowly but never walk backward.” —
Unknown

quote: We learn to walk by falling down. If we never fell down, we would never walk.
author: Robert Kiyosaki
h:
“We learn to walk by falling down. If we never fell down, we would never walk.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.
author: Kahlil Gibran
h:
“If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.” —
Kahlil Gibran

quote: We must not be afraid of dreaming the seemingly impossible if we want the seemingly impossible to become a reality.

h:
“We must not be afraid of dreaming the seemingly impossible if we want the seemingly impossible to become a reality.” —
Vaclav Havel

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank
h:
“Whoever is happy will make others happy too.” —
Anne Frank

quote: When you are talented you do it whatever it is until your fingers bleed or your eyes are ready to fall out of your head.

h:

Stephen King

h:

quote: Projecting your mind into a successful situation is the most powerful means to achieve goals.

h:

Estee Lauder

quote: Give credit where credit is due: simply said, if you want loyalty and best effort, you must be thoughtful.

h:

Estee Lauder

quote: We suffer for the simple reason that suffering is biologically useful. It is nature's preferred agent for inspiring change.

h:

Mark Manson

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain
h:
“The secret of getting ahead is getting started.” —
Mark Twain

quote: Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious.
author: Sigmund Freud
h:
“Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious. ” —
Sigmund Freud

quote: I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees.
author: Euripides
h:
“I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees.” —
Euripides

quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
author: Mark Twain
h:

Mark Twain

quote: Man's character is his fate.
author: Heraclitus
h:
“Man's character is his fate.” —
Heraclitus

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville
h:
“It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.” —
Herman Melville

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides
h:
“He is not a lover who does not love forever.” —
Euripides

quote: It is our experiences that mold us into who we are...during times of adversity our true character will show.
author: Unknown
h:

Unknown

quote: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts.
author: Charles Dickens
h:
“Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts.” —
Charles Dickens

quote: Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.

h:
“Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.” —
Huang Po

quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.

h:
“When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.” —

quote: Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
h:
“Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
author: Coco Chanel

Coco Chanel

quote: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.

quote: You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become.
author: Bhagavad Gita

Bhagavad Gita

quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic.

Woody Allen

quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Where your talents and the needs of the world cross, there lies your vocation.

h:

Aristotle

quote: Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.

h:

Charles Spurgeon

quote: There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action.

h:

quote: Much learning does not teach understanding.

h:
“Much learning does not teach understanding.” —

quote: No one can compete with you on being you. Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.

h:

Naval Ravikant

quote: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.

quote: Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.

quote: Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.

Zig Ziglar

quote: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.

h:

quote: Normal is the average of deviance.

Rita Mae Brown

quote: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.

h:
“Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.” —
Anne Frank

quote: It's your outlook on life that counts.
author: Betty White
h:
“It's your outlook on life that counts.” —
Betty White

quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.

h:
“Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.” —
Mother Teresa

quote: We are all like the bright moon, we still have our darker side.

h:

Kahlil Gibran

quote: Don't let the past steal your present.
author: Cherralea Morgen
h:
“Don't let the past steal your present.” —

quote: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.

h:
“If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.” —
Emily Dickinson

quote: Engage in those actions and thoughts that nurture the good qualities you want to have.

h:

Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.

h:

Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.

h:

Elon Musk

quote: You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.
author: Nelson Mandela
h:

Nelson Mandela

quote: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
author: Zig Ziglar
h:

Zig Ziglar

quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.

h:
“The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.” —
Walt Disney

quote: Your neighbor is the man who needs you.
author: Elbert Hubbard
h:
“Your neighbor is the man who needs you.” —
Elbert Hubbard

quote: The Truth is realized in an instant; the Act is practiced step by step.
author: Seungsahn
h:

Seungsahn

quote: When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.

h:
“When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To belittle, you have to be little.
author: Kahlil Gibran
h:
“To belittle, you have to be little.” —
Kahlil Gibran

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

h:

Steve Jobs

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.

h:

Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: There is no one giant step that does it. It's a lot of little steps.

h:
“There is no one giant step that does it. It's a lot of little steps.” —
Peter A. Cohen

quote: A path is made by walking on it.
author: Zhuangzi
h:
“A path is made by walking on it.” —
Zhuangzi

quote: To create more positive results in your life, replace 'if only' with 'next time'.
author: Celestine Chua
h:
“To create more positive results in your life, replace 'if only' with 'next time'.” —
Celestine Chua

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

Winston Churchill

quote: The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.
author: Roy T. Bennett
h:
“The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.” —
Roy T. Bennett

quote: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.

h:

Rumi

quote: Let not your mind run on what you lack as much as on what you have already.

h:
“Let not your mind run on what you lack as much as on what you have already.” —
Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.

h:
“If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.” —
Bob Proctor

quote: When you are tempted to give up, your breakthrough is probably just around the corner.

h:

Joyce Meyer

quote: Who you are is always right.
author: Ming-Dao Deng
h:
“Who you are is always right.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

quote: Without struggle, no progress and no result. Every breaking of habit produces a change in the machine.

h:

G.I. Gurdjieff

quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.

h:

Euripides

quote: Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
h:
“Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.

Zig Ziglar

quote: Great loves too must be endured.
author: Coco Chanel

Coco Chanel

quote: It doesn't matter what you do, only how well you do it.

h:

Dan Millman

quote: An approximate answer to the right question is worth a great deal more than a precise answer to the wrong question.

John Tukey

quote: Discipline is the mark of intelligent living.

Sathya Sai Baba

quote: Happiness is a quality of the soul...not a function of one's material circumstances.

Aristotle

quote: I wasn't brave, I just didn't have time to be scared.

Amelia Earhart

quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.

Dale Carnegie

quote: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.

quote: Outstanding people have one thing in common: an absolute sense of mission.

Zig Ziglar

quote: Time is a game played beautifully by children.

Heraclitus

quote: The attempt to escape from pain, is what creates more pain.

quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

Steve Jobs

quote: Everything flows, nothing stands still.
author: Heraclitus

Heraclitus

quote: Everything is created twice, first in the mind and then in reality.

quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.

Mother Teresa

quote: Today is plenty; right now is enough. Tomorrow will come in good time. Until it does, live the depth of now.

Ralph Marston

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.

Jim Rohn

quote: The secret of life isn't what happens to you, but what you do with what happens to you.

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

Lao Tzu

quote: Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.

quote: When you move beyond your fear, you feel free.

quote: The mind that turns ever outward Will have no end to craving. Only the mind turned inward Will find a still-point of peace.

quote: Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.

quote: It is not titles that honour men, but men that honour titles.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli
h:
“It is not titles that honour men, but men that honour titles.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Do not believe that you will reach your destination without leaving the shore.
author: Chinese Proverb
h:
“Do not believe that you will reach your destination without leaving the shore. ” —
Chinese Proverb

quote: You are the only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life.
author: Les Brown
h:
“You are the only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life.” —
Les Brown

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James
h:
“Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.” —
William James

quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
author: Amelia Earhart
h:
“A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.” —
Amelia Earhart

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn
h:
“Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.” —
Jim Rohn

quote: Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
author: Dogen
h:
“Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.” —
Dogen

quote: Victims recite problems, leaders provide solutions.
author: Robin Sharma
h:
“Victims recite problems, leaders provide solutions.” —
Robin Sharma

quote: What a liberation to realize that 'the voice in my head' is not who I am. Who am I then? The one who sees that.
author: Eckhart Tolle
h:
“What a liberation to realize that 'the voice in my head' is not who I am. Who am I then? The one who sees that.” —
Eckhart Tolle

quote: Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.
author: Alfred Adler
h:
“Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.” —
Alfred Adler

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey
h:
“Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.” —
Oprah Winfrey

quote: Silence is sometimes the best answer.
author: Dalai Lama
h:
“Silence is sometimes the best answer.” —
Dalai Lama

quote: My guiding principle is this: Guilt is never to be doubted.
author: Franz Kafka
h:
“My guiding principle is this: Guilt is never to be doubted. ” —
Franz Kafka

quote: In a world of change, the learners shall inherit the earth, while the learned shall find themselves perfectly suited for a world that no longer exists.
author: Eric Hoffer
h:
“In a world of change, the learners shall inherit the earth, while the learned shall find themselves perfectly suited for a world that no longer exists.” —
Eric Hoffer

quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar
h:
“People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.” —
Zig Ziglar

quote: Re-examine all that you have been told... dismiss that which insults your soul.
author: Walt Whitman
h:
“Re-examine all that you have been told... dismiss that which insults your soul.” —
Walt Whitman
